command.name: fix
command.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code

disambiguation.description: Propose a fix for the problems in the selected code
examples: There is a problem in this code. Rewrite the code to show it with the bug fixed.

parts.text:
Property 'trim' does not exist on type 'string | string[]'.
  Property 'trim' does not exist on type 'string[]'.

message.text:
/fix Property 'trim' does not exist on type 'string | string[]'.
  Property 'trim' does not exist on type 'string[]'.

response.value: is a string before calling `.trim()`, or handle the case where it could be an array.

toolCallRounds.response:
You should ensure that `search` is a string before calling `.trim()`, or handle the case where it could be an array.

---FILEPATH /home/tariqul/Projects/natural-sefa-v2/app/(root)/products/page.tsx
---FIND
```
  const [{ products = [], hasNextPage = false }, categories] = await Promise.all([
    getAllProducts({
      search: search?.trim(),
      page: Number(page) || 1,
      limit: 12,
      sort: sort || "default",
      category: category,
    }),
    getAllCategories(),
  ]);
```
---REPLACE
```
  const [{ products = [], hasNextPage = false }, categories] = await Promise.all([
    getAllProducts({
      search: Array.isArray(search) ? search[0]?.trim() : search?.trim(),
      page: Number(page) || 1,
      limit: 12,
      sort: sort || "default",
      category: category,
    }),
    getAllCategories(),
  ]);
```
---COMPLETE

examples: Add a function that returns the sum of two numbers
